crypto_elements.description: RC4-style stream cipher with key scheduling algorithm

crypto_elements.description: ChaCha20-style quarter round with add-rotate-xor operations

primary_weakness: Contains RC4-style implementation which has known statistical biases and key scheduling weaknesses
additional_notes: RC4 component is vulnerable to statistical attacks, while ChaCha20-style component is considered secure
